ground_truth: She spots a razor and a shaving brush. He looks at her defiantly. She sighs and, carrying a washing basket, runs downstairs. Red and blue lights flash outside, as she crosses to the front door. A blonde woman in a blue top is standing among the group of police officers. Helen looks shocked. Motorcycle outriders prepare to escort the waiting car. A stern-faced woman with dark hair sits in the front seat. The blonde woman puts her arms protectively around the bemused Jacob. The convoy of two cars and four motorcycles pulls away. Lights flashing, they speed down rain-soaked streets. He points to the road ahead. Beyond the outriders, their side of the highway is empty. She stares at the expressionless agent who stares straight ahead ignoring her. More vehicles join the convoy rolling down the empty nighttime highway. Military vehicles and personnel maneuver as gates open to admit them. A Chinook helicopter stands outside a large hangar. The convoy pulls up at an aircraft. It's loaded rack down. The agent ushers the stunned Helen towards the helicopter. Inside, it's packed with soldiers and some civilians. Helen finds a space and sits down nervously. She looks across at a man with a dark, bushy beard. The twin rotor helicopter lifts off into the dark night sky. Floodlights illuminate a sports field teeming with equipment and personnel. The chopper lands mid-field. A soldier carries a heavy machine gun on his shoulder. As police cars escort more vehicles through the military throng, soldiers push racks of protective clothing along a walkway. A NASA space agency logo adorns the screen in a large lecture theater. It's on a collision course with the Earth. Graphics show impact location Manhattan. Helen stares. The screen shows one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is counting down. She tentatively opens the toilet cubicle door. She looks nervously at the woman in military uniform and nods. Choppers hurtle towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen looks shocked and stares out of the window of the chopper at the city lights. Helen and Yusef hold hands as the scientists brace themselves. Helen opens her eyes. A bright ball of light is moving through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It passes behind the towering Empire State Building. It illuminates the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral and moves with swirling brilliance towards Central Park. Trees cast eerie shadows across the grass as people gather and stare up in horror. As Helen stares out of the chopper window at the object sinking towards the ground, powerful blasts of energy slow its descent, generating clouds of billowing vapor. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its intense light. The draft from the object's descent causes a tsunami of wind and vapor.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She notices a razor and a shaving brush. He gazes at her defiantly. She exhales and, carrying a laundry basket, runs downstairs. Crimson and azure lights flicker outside, as she crosses to the entrance door. A fair-haired woman in a blue top is standing among the group of police officers. Helen looks astounded. Motorcycle escort-riders prepare to accompany the waiting automobile. A stern-faced woman with dark hair sits in the front seat. The fair-haired woman puts her arms protectively around the bewildered Jacob. The procession of two automobiles and four motorcycles moves away. Lights flickering, they speed down rain-drenched streets. He gestures to the road ahead. Beyond the escort-riders, their side of the highway is vacant. She gazes at the impassive agent who stares straight ahead ignoring her. More vehicles join the procession rolling down the vacant nighttime highway. Military vehicles and personnel maneuver as gates open to admit them. A Chinook helicopter stands outside a large hangar. The procession stops at an aircraft. It's loaded rack down. The agent guides the stunned Helen towards the helicopter. Inside, it's packed with soldiers and some civilians. Helen finds a space and sits down anxiously. She looks across at a man with a dark, bushy beard. The twin rotor helicopter lifts off into the dark night sky. Floodlights illuminate a sports field brimming with equipment and personnel. The chopper lands mid-field. A soldier carries a heavy machine gun on his shoulder. As police cars escort more vehicles through the military throng, soldiers push racks of protective clothing along a walkway. A NASA space agency logo adorns the screen in a large lecture theater. It's on a collision course with the Earth. Graphics show impact location Manhattan. Helen gazes. The screen shows one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is counting down. She cautiously opens the toilet cubicle door. She looks anxiously at the woman in military uniform and nods. Choppers rush towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen looks astounded and gazes out of the window of the chopper at the city lights. Helen and Yusef hold hands as the scientists brace themselves. Helen opens her eyes. A bright ball of light is moving through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It passes behind the towering Empire State Building. It illuminates the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral and moves with swirling brilliance towards Central Park. Trees cast eerie shadows across the grass as people gather and gaze up in horror. As Helen gazes out of the chopper window at the object descending towards the ground, powerful blasts of energy slow its descent, generating clouds of billowing vapor. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its intense light. The draft from the object's descent causes a tsunami of wind and vapor.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: A razor and a shaving brush are spotted by her. Defiantly, he is looked at by her. A sigh is given by her, and, carrying a washing basket, the stairs are run down by her. Red and blue lights are flashed outside, as the front door is crossed by her. Among the group of police officers, a blonde woman in a blue top stands. Shock is shown on Helen's face. The waiting car is prepared to be escorted by motorcycle outriders. A stern-faced woman with dark hair is seated in the front seat. Jacob is protectively embraced by the blonde woman, with his bemusement visible. Away is pulled the convoy of two cars and four motorcycles. With lights flashing, rain-soaked streets are sped down by them. The road ahead is pointed to by him. Beyond the outriders, the highway is found empty on their side. At the expressionless agent who stares straight ahead, ignoring her, she stares. More vehicles are joined by the convoy rolling down the empty nighttime highway. As gates open to admit them, military vehicles and personnel maneuver. Outside a large hangar, a Chinook helicopter stands. An aircraft is pulled up to by the convoy. It's racked down and loaded. Helen is ushered by the agent towards the helicopter, her shock visible. Inside, soldiers and some civilians pack it. Space is found by Helen, and she nervously sits down. A man with a dark, bushy beard is looked at by her from across. Into the dark night sky, the twin rotor helicopter is lifted off. A sports field, teeming with equipment and personnel, is illuminated by floodlights. Mid-field, the chopper lands. A heavy machine gun is carried on his shoulder by a soldier. As more vehicles are escorted by police cars through the military throng, racks of protective clothing are pushed along a walkway by soldiers. The NASA space agency logo adorns the screen in a large lecture theater. The Earth is on a collision course with it. Manhattan is shown by graphics as the impact location. Helen stares. One hour 18 minutes 43 seconds is shown on the screen. The time is counted down. Tentatively, the toilet cubicle door is opened by her. Nervously, she looks at the woman in military uniform and nods. Towards the bright lights of Manhattan, choppers hurtle. Shocked, Helen looks and stares out of the window of the chopper at the city lights. Helen and Yusef brace themselves as they hold hands with the scientists. Her eyes are opened by Helen. Through the dark sky above the illuminated city, a bright ball of light is moved. Behind the towering Empire State Building, it passes. The bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral is illuminated and towards Central Park it moves with swirling brilliance. Eerie shadows are cast across the grass by trees as people gather and stare up in horror. As Helen stares out of the chopper window at the object sinking towards the ground, powerful blasts of energy slow its descent, generating clouds of billowing vapor. In its intense light, the watching crowds are silhouetted. A tsunami of wind and vapor is caused by the draft from the object's descent.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She spots a razor and shaving brush. He stares defiantly, and she sighs, carrying a laundry basket downstairs. Red and blue lights flash outside as she reaches the door. A blonde woman in blue stands with police officers, and Helen looks shocked. Motorcycle outriders prepare to escort a waiting car. A stern woman with dark hair sits inside. The blonde woman protectively holds Jacob. The convoy, two cars and four motorcycles, pulls away, speeding down rain-soaked streets. He points ahead to the empty highway. She stares at the expressionless agent ignoring her. More vehicles join the convoy on the empty road. Military vehicles and personnel move as gates open. A Chinook helicopter stands by a hangar. The convoy stops at an aircraft; the agent directs the stunned Helen toward the helicopter packed with soldiers and civilians. She finds a seat and eyes a man with a bushy beard. The helicopter lifts into the dark sky. Floodlights reveal a sports field full of equipment and personnel. The chopper lands. A soldier carries a heavy machine gun, while police escort more vehicles as soldiers push racks of protective clothing. A NASA logo appears on a theater screen. It's on a collision course with Earth; graphics show impact at Manhattan. Helen watches the countdown: one hour, 18 minutes, 43 seconds. She tentatively opens a toilet cubicle, nodding at a woman in military uniform. Choppers race toward Manhattan's bright lights. Helen looks shocked, staring out at city lights. She and Yusef hold hands as scientists brace themselves. Helen opens her eyes to see a bright light moving through the dark sky past the Empire State Building. It illuminates Saint Patrick's Cathedral, moving toward Central Park. Trees cast eerie shadows as people watch in horror. Helen stares from the chopper window as the object descends, slowed by energy blasts generating vapor clouds. The crowd is silhouetted in its light, and its descent causes a tsunami of wind and vapor.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Spotting a razor and brush, she sighs and runs downstairs with a washing basket. Outside, red and blue lights flash as she heads to the door. A blonde woman in a blue top stands with police. Helen is shocked. Motorcycle outriders escort a car with a stern-faced, dark-haired woman in front. The blonde hugs Jacob. A convoy of cars and motorcycles, lights flashing, speeds down rain-soaked streets. The highway is empty on their side. She stares at the expressionless agent, ignoring her. More vehicles join the convoy. Military vehicles maneuver through gates. A Chinook helicopter waits by a hangar. The convoy reaches an aircraft. The agent leads Helen to the packed helicopter. Helen sits nervously, eyeing a bearded man. The helicopter lifts off into the night. Floodlights reveal a sports field full of equipment. Soldiers with machine guns stand by as police cars escort vehicles. Soldiers push protective clothing racks. A NASA logo appears in a lecture theater. Impact location: Manhattan. Helen stares at the countdown: one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. She nervously nods at a woman in uniform. Choppers head to Manhattan. Helen, shocked, looks out at city lights. With Yusef, she holds hands as scientists brace for impact. A bright light moves over the city, passing the Empire State Building and illuminating Saint Patrick's Cathedral, heading for Central Park. As people stare in horror, energy blasts slow its descent, creating vapor clouds. The crowd is silhouetted in its intense light, with wind and vapor sweeping across.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: As she walks through the dimly lit room, her eyes catch sight of a small razor and an old-fashioned shaving brush resting on the counter. He looks at her with a defiant stare, his eyes full of unspoken challenges. With a deep, resigned sigh, she picks up a basket overflowing with laundry and quickly makes her way downstairs at a hurried pace. Outside, vibrant flashes of red and blue lights dance in the night air, as she hastily makes her way to the front door. There, standing amongst a group of solemn police officers, is a blonde woman dressed in a bright blue top. Helen's face is etched with a look of shock and disbelief. Meanwhile, nearby, motorcycle outriders stand at the ready, preparing to escort a waiting car down the road. A woman with a serious expression and dark hair sits in the front seat, looking stern and unyielding. The blonde woman, in a protective gesture, wraps her arms around the bewildered Jacob. The convoy, composed of two sleek cars and four powerful motorcycles, revs up and pulls away, lights flashing urgently as they accelerate down the rain-slicked streets. He points insistently to the road ahead. Beyond the outriders, their side of the highway stretches empty and clear. She fixes her gaze on the unyielding agent, who sits expressionless, staring straight ahead and deliberately ignoring her presence. As they continue their journey, more vehicles seamlessly join the convoy, cruising down the deserted nighttime highway. Military vehicles, along with personnel, move with precision as wide gates swing open to allow their entry. A massive Chinook helicopter stands poised outside a cavernous hangar. The convoy pulls up directly at the waiting aircraft, its ramp lowered invitingly. The agent, with an authoritative gesture, ushers the bewildered and disoriented Helen towards the helicopter. Inside the cabin, soldiers and a scattering of civilians fill nearly every available space. Helen finds a narrow spot and sits down, her nerves evident. She glances across at a man with a thick, dark, bushy beard, noting his presence among those onboard. The twin-rotor helicopter takes off smoothly, rising into the pitch-black night sky. Below, floodlights illuminate a sports field bustling with equipment and personnel. The chopper descends mid-field. A soldier, burdened with a heavy machine gun slung over his shoulder, walks purposefully. As police cars guide more vehicles through the throng of military activity, soldiers diligently push racks of protective clothing along a narrow walkway. Inside a large lecture theater, a screen prominently displays the NASA space agency logo. It ominously reveals that the path of destruction is headed towards Earth. Graphics vividly illustrate the anticipated impact location: Manhattan. Helen's eyes widen in disbelief as she stares at the screen in front of her. The digital clock counts down ominously, showing one hour, 18 minutes, and 43 seconds remaining. She cautiously opens the door of the cramped toilet cubicle, casting a nervous glance at the woman clad in military uniform and nodding slightly. In the sky overhead, choppers race urgently towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen, with a look of shock etched on her face, gazes out of the helicopter window, taking in the vast expanse of city lights below. She and Yusef hold hands tightly as the scientists brace themselves for the imminent event. Helen slowly opens her eyes again, witnessing a bright ball of light that moves gracefully through the dark expanse of the sky above the illuminated cityscape. It weaves its way behind the towering silhouette of the Empire State Building, casting an ethereal glow. The gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral is bathed in swirling brilliance as the light moves steadily towards Central Park. Trees, standing silently, cast long, eerie shadows across the grassy expanses as people gather, captivated by what they see, staring upward in a mixture of disbelief and horror. As Helen watches from the helicopter window, the object descends towards the ground, its descent slowed dramatically by powerful blasts of energy, creating clouds of billowing vapor in its wake. The intense light silhouettes the watching crowds, creating an otherworldly scene. The draft from the object's descent stirs up a tumult of wind and vapor, sweeping through the onlookers like a tsunami of air and light.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: As she makes her way through the dimly lit room, her eyes are drawn to the sight of a small, polished razor and an old-fashioned shaving brush that are quietly resting on the counter. He fixes his gaze upon her with a defiant and unwavering stare, his eyes filled with a myriad of unspoken challenges that seem to linger in the tense atmosphere. With a deep, resigned sigh escaping her lips, she picks up a laundry basket brimming with a mountain of clothes and swiftly heads downstairs, moving at a hurried pace. Outside, vibrant flashes of red and blue lights illuminate the night air, creating a chaotic dance of colors as she hastily proceeds towards the front door. Standing there, amidst a solemn group of police officers with stern expressions, is a blonde woman dressed in a striking bright blue top. Helen's face is etched with an unmistakable look of shock and disbelief, a reflection of the surreal situation unfolding before her eyes. Meanwhile, not far away, motorcycle outriders stand prepared, ready to escort a waiting car down the road with precision and purpose. A woman with dark hair and a serious, unwavering expression sits in the front seat of the car, appearing stern and unyielding. In a protective gesture, the blonde woman wraps her arms around the confused and bewildered Jacob, offering him a semblance of comfort. The convoy, sleek in its composition with two cars and four powerful motorcycles, revs up and begins to pull away, their lights flashing urgently as they speed down the rain-slicked streets. He insistently points to the road ahead, directing attention to the path they must follow. Beyond the outriders, the highway on their side stretches empty and clear, a stark contrast to the tumultuous activity surrounding them. She fixes her gaze on the unyielding agent, who sits expressionless and unmoving, staring straight ahead with a deliberate effort to ignore her presence. As they continue their journey, more vehicles smoothly merge with the convoy, cruising seamlessly down the deserted nighttime highway. Military vehicles, along with personnel, navigate with precision as wide gates swing open to allow their entry into a secure area. A massive Chinook helicopter stands poised outside a cavernous hangar, ready for its mission. The convoy pulls up directly at the waiting aircraft, its ramp lowered invitingly to facilitate their swift entry. The authoritative agent gestures emphatically, ushering the bewildered and disoriented Helen towards the helicopter, guiding her with determined efficiency. Inside the cabin, soldiers and a few civilians occupy nearly every available space, their presence a testament to the seriousness of the situation. Helen finds a narrow spot to sit down, her nerves plainly evident as she glances across at a man with a thick, dark, bushy beard, noting his presence among those onboard. The twin-rotor helicopter takes off with a smooth ascent, rising into the pitch-black night sky overhead. Below, floodlights illuminate a sports field bustling with equipment and personnel, the scene teeming with activity. The helicopter descends mid-field, touching down with precision. A soldier, burdened with the weight of a heavy machine gun slung over his shoulder, walks with purpose and determination. As police cars guide more vehicles through the throng of military activity, soldiers diligently push racks of protective clothing along a narrow walkway, ensuring everything is in place. Inside a large lecture theater, a prominent screen displays the NASA space agency logo. It ominously reveals the path of destruction headed towards Earth, with graphics vividly illustrating the anticipated impact location: Manhattan. Helen's eyes widen in disbelief as she stares at the screen in front of her, the reality of the situation sinking in. The digital clock counts down ominously, showing one hour, 18 minutes, and 43 seconds remaining, a stark reminder of the urgency. She cautiously opens the door of the cramped toilet cubicle, casting a nervous glance at the woman clad in a military uniform and nodding slightly in acknowledgment. In the sky overheard, choppers race with urgency towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen, with a look of shock deeply etched on her face, gazes out of the helicopter window, taking in the sprawling expanse of city lights below. She and Yusef hold hands tightly, their grip a source of shared strength, as the scientists brace themselves for the impending event. Helen slowly opens her eyes once more, witnessing a bright ball of light moving gracefully across the dark expanse of the sky above the illuminated cityscape. It weaves its way behind the towering silhouette of the Empire State Building, casting an ethereal glow in its wake. The gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral is bathed in swirling brilliance as the light continues its steady journey towards Central Park. Trees stand silently, their long, eerie shadows stretching across the grassy expanses as people gather, captivated by the extraordinary sight playing out before them, staring upward in a mixture of disbelief and horror. As Helen watches from the helicopter window, the object begins its descent towards the ground, its pace dramatically slowed by powerful blasts of energy, creating clouds of billowing vapor in its path. The intense light silhouettes the watching crowds, creating an otherworldly scene of awe and amazement. The draft from the object's descent stirs up a tumult of wind and vapor, sweeping through the onlookers like a tsunami of air and light, enveloping them in its wake.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She notices a razor and a shaving brush lying nearby, prompting her to glance towards him, where he meets her gaze with a defiant expression. She exhales deeply and, gathering her resolve, picks up a washing basket and quickly hurries down the stairs. As she makes her way to the front door, the flashing red and blue lights of police vehicles illuminate the scene outside. Stepping out, she observes a blonde woman dressed in a blue top standing amidst a group of police officers. Upon seeing this, Helen's face registers a look of shock. Meanwhile, motorcycle outriders begin their preparations to escort a car that waits nearby, where a stern-looking woman with dark hair is seated in the front passenger seat. The blonde woman standing outside wraps her arms protectively around a bewildered Jacob, providing a reassuring presence. The convoy, consisting of two cars and four motorcycles, starts pulling away, picking up speed down the rain-drenched streets, their lights flashing brightly. A man in the vehicle points ahead to the clear road, where, beyond the outriders, their lane of the highway is devoid of any traffic. Helen shifts her attention to the expressionless agent sitting nearby, who continues to stare straight ahead, seemingly oblivious to her presence. As the convoy progresses down the desolate highway at night, additional vehicles join the procession. They approach a secured area, where military vehicles and personnel arrange themselves strategically while gates open to let them enter. Outside a large hangar stands a Chinook helicopter, awaiting their arrival. The convoy pulls up beside an aircraft in the process of being loaded with equipment. The agent directs the dazed Helen toward the helicopter, and once inside, she notices that it is filled with soldiers and a few civilians. She identifies an available spot to sit and settles down with a sense of apprehension, her gaze eventually landing on a man sporting a dark, bushy beard. As everyone takes their place, the twin-rotor helicopter takes flight, lifting into the inky night sky. The journey brings them over a sports field, illuminated by floodlights and bustling with activity, where various pieces of equipment and military personnel move purposefully. The helicopter descends and lands in the middle of the field. A nearby soldier is seen carrying a heavy machine gun on his shoulder. While police cars continue to escort additional vehicles through the organized chaos of the military environment, soldiers efficiently transport racks of protective clothing along a designated walkway. Not far away, a NASA space agency logo becomes visible on a screen inside a large lecture theater, providing vital information to those gathered. The screen displays an imminent threat—a collision course with Earth, with graphics indicating the impact location as Manhattan. Helen's eyes remain fixated on the screen, absorbing the gravity of the situation. It indicates there is precisely one hour, eighteen minutes, and forty-three seconds remaining, with the countdown actively decreasing. Seeking a moment of privacy, she cautiously opens the door of a toilet cubicle, then looks with apprehension at a woman clad in military uniform, giving her a nod of acknowledgment. Meanwhile, helicopters streak through the night sky, heading toward the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen, overwhelmed with shock, peers out of the chopper window, gazing at the city lights below. Together with Yusef, she holds hands as the scientists on board prepare themselves for what is to come. As the situation unfolds, she opens her eyes to witness a radiant ball of light tracing a path through the dark sky above the brightly lit cityscape. This glowing object travels behind the towering silhouette of the Empire State Building, casting its glow upon the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral before directing its swirling brilliance toward Central Park. On the ground, trees cast ominous shadows across the grass as people congregate, staring upwards in terror. As Helen continues to watch from the chopper, she sees the object descending, its fall gradually cushioned by powerful energy blasts that generate thick clouds of vapor. The intense light from the object silhouettes the crowd below, who are entranced by its spectacle. Their hair and clothing whip wildly as a tsunami of wind and vapor rushes outward from the object's descent, marking the culmination of this extraordinary series of events.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: She notices a razor and shaving brush, exchanges a defiant look with him, sighs, and heads downstairs with a washing basket. As she nears the front door, red and blue lights flash outside, revealing a blonde woman in a blue top among the police officers, shocking Helen. Motorcycle outriders start to escort a waiting car, containing a stern-faced, dark-haired woman. The blonde woman protectively holds a bemused Jacob as the convoy of two cars and four motorcycles departs, speeding down rain-soaked streets. With the highway cleared, he points ahead while she focuses on ignoring the expressionless agent beside her. Additional vehicles join the convoy on the empty highway, with military personnel and equipment maneuvering as gates open, revealing a Chinook helicopter near a large hangar. As the convoy arrives at an aircraft, the agent guides a stunned Helen towards the helicopter, filled with soldiers and civilians. She finds a seat, looking nervously at a man with a dark beard as the twin-rotor helicopter ascends into the night. It lands on a floodlit sports field bustling with activity. Amidst soldiers and equipment, police cars escort more vehicles, while soldiers push racks of protective clothing. In a large lecture theater, a screen bearing the NASA logo displays a collision course with Earth, targeting Manhattan, as Helen stares at the countdown showing one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. She hesitantly opens a toilet cubicle, nodding at a woman in a military uniform. Helicopters race towards Manhattan's bright lights, with Helen shocked as she watches from the chopper. Holding hands with Yusef, they brace themselves as a bright light moves through the sky, illuminating landmarks like the Empire State Building and Saint Patrick's Cathedral. The light swirls towards Central Park, casting eerie shadows as bystanders watch in horror. As it descends, powerful energy blasts slow its fall, creating vapor clouds and silhouetting the crowd, while wind and vapor sweep through the area.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She spots a razor and a shaving brush, often associated with traditional wet shaving techniques. He looks at her defiantly, as if challenging the unspoken tension between them. She sighs and, carrying a washing basket filled with linens still warm from the dryer, runs downstairs. Red and blue lights flash outside, as she crosses to the front door where a police presence signifies a significant event. A blonde woman in a blue top, likely a police liaison, is standing among the group of police officers. Helen looks shocked, realizing the gravity of the situation. Motorcycle outriders, trained for high-speed escorts, prepare to accompany the waiting car. A stern-faced woman with dark hair and a government ID badge sits in the front seat. The blonde woman puts her arms protectively around the bemused Jacob, who seems unaware of the unfolding drama. The convoy of two cars and four motorcycles pulls away. Lights flashing, they speed down rain-soaked streets known for their treacherous conditions. He points to the road ahead, cleared by the police for safe passage. Beyond the outriders, their side of the highway is empty, secured for the convoy's urgent journey. She stares at the expressionless agent, likely from a federal agency, who stares straight ahead ignoring her, maintaining professionalism. More vehicles join the convoy rolling down the empty nighttime highway, signaling increased importance. Military vehicles and personnel maneuver as gates open to admit them into a secured perimeter. A Chinook helicopter, known for its heavy-lifting capability, stands outside a large hangar, ready for transport. The convoy pulls up at an aircraft. It's loaded rack down, prepared for immediate departure. The agent ushers the stunned Helen towards the helicopter. Inside, it's packed with soldiers and some civilians, indicating a mix of security and key personnel. Helen finds a space and sits down nervously, feeling the weight of the situation. She looks across at a man with a dark, bushy beard, who is quietly focused. The twin rotor helicopter lifts off into the dark night sky, the thumping rotors echoing the urgency. Floodlights illuminate a sports field teeming with equipment and personnel, suggesting a coordinated operation. The chopper lands mid-field on the makeshift helipad. A soldier carries a heavy machine gun on his shoulder, indicating readiness for any threat. As police cars escort more vehicles through the military throng, soldiers push racks of protective clothing along a walkway, preparing for potential hazards. A NASA space agency logo, symbolizing advanced technology and exploration, adorns the screen in a large lecture theater. It's on a collision course with the Earth, causing widespread panic. Graphics show impact location Manhattan, one of the world's most densely populated areas. Helen stares, comprehending the catastrophic implications. The screen shows one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is counting down with ominous precision. She tentatively opens the toilet cubicle door, seeking a momentary refuge. She looks nervously at the woman in military uniform and nods, acknowledging the shared tension. Choppers hurtle towards the bright lights of Manhattan, the iconic skyline now a backdrop to impending disaster. Helen looks shocked and stares out of the window of the chopper at the city lights, now overshadowed by fear. Helen and Yusef, a scientist known for his expertise, hold hands as the scientists brace themselves for the worst. Helen opens her eyes. A bright ball of light, unlike anything she's seen, is moving through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It passes behind the towering Empire State Building, a symbol of architectural achievement. It illuminates the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral, a historic landmark, and moves with swirling brilliance towards Central Park, the city's green oasis. Trees cast eerie shadows across the grass as people gather and stare up in horror. As Helen stares out of the chopper window at the object sinking towards the ground, powerful blasts of energy slow its descent, generating clouds of billowing vapor, a protective measure. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its intense light. The draft from the object's descent causes a tsunami of wind and vapor, a testament to its immense power.

test_cases.name: Addition (~50%)
test_cases.description: She spots a razor and a shaving brush. He looks at her defiantly. She sighs and carrying a washing basket runs downstairs. Red and blue lights flash outside as she crosses to the front door. A blonde woman in a blue top is standing among the group of police officers. Helen looks shocked. Motorcycle outriders prepare to escort the waiting car. A sternfaced woman with dark hair sits in the front seat. The blonde woman puts her arms protectively around the bemused Jacob. The convoy of two cars and four motorcycles pulls away. Lights flashing they speed down rainsoaked streets. He points to the road ahead. Beyond the outriders their side of the highway is empty. She stares at the expressionless agent who stares straight ahead ignoring her. More vehicles join the convoy rolling down the empty nighttime highway. Military vehicles and personnel maneuver as gates open to admit them. A Chinook helicopter stands outside a large hangar. The convoy pulls up at an aircraft. It is loaded rack down. The agent ushers the stunned Helen towards the helicopter. Inside it is packed with soldiers and some civilians. Helen finds a space and sits down nervously. She looks across at a man with a dark bushy beard. The twin rotor helicopter lifts off into the dark night sky. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. Floodlights illuminate a sports field teeming with equipment and personnel. The chopper lands midfield. A soldier carries a heavy machine gun on his shoulder. As police cars escort more vehicles through the military throng soldiers push racks of protective clothing along a walkway. A NASA space agency logo adorns the screen in a large lecture theater. It is on a collision course with the Earth. Graphics show impact location. Manhattan. Helen stares. The screen shows one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is counting down. She tentatively opens the toilet cubicle door. She looks nervously at the woman in military uniform and nods. Choppers hurtle towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen looks shocked and stares out of the window of the chopper at the city lights. Helen and Yusef hold hands as the scientists brace themselves. Helen opens her eyes. A bright ball of light is moving through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It passes behind the towering Empire State Building. It illuminates the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral and moves with swirling brilliance towards Central Park. Trees cast eerie shadows across the grass as people gather and stare up in horror. As Helen stares out of the chopper window at the object sinking towards the ground. powerful blasts of energy slow its descent generating clouds of billowing vapor. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its intense light. The draft from the object's descent causes a tsunami of wind and vapor.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She spots a wrench and a paintbrush. He looks at her defiantly. She sighs and, carrying a laundry hamper, runs downstairs. Green and yellow lights flash outside, as she crosses to the front door. A brunette woman in a red dress is standing among the group of firefighters. Helen looks shocked. Bicycle riders prepare to escort the waiting van. A stern-faced man with a mustache sits in the front seat. The brunette woman puts her arms protectively around the bewildered Jacob. The convoy of two vans and four bicycles pulls away. Lights flashing, they speed down snow-covered streets. He points to the path ahead. Beyond the riders, their side of the boulevard is empty. She stares at the expressionless officer who stares straight ahead ignoring her. More vehicles join the convoy rolling down the empty nighttime boulevard. Ambulance vehicles and paramedics maneuver as gates open to admit them. A C-130 aircraft stands outside a giant hangar. The convoy pulls up at a spacecraft. It's loaded gear down. The officer ushers the stunned Helen towards the aircraft. Inside, it's packed with medics and some civilians. Helen finds a space and sits down nervously. She looks across at a woman with a dark, braided hair. The quad-propeller aircraft takes off into the dark night sky. Spotlights illuminate a soccer field teeming with supplies and medics. The craft lands mid-field. A paramedic carries a medical kit on her shoulder. As fire trucks escort more vehicles through the medical throng, medics push carts of emergency supplies along a path. A NOAA weather agency logo adorns the screen in a large conference hall. It's on a collision course with the planet. Graphics show impact location Chicago. Helen stares. The screen shows one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is counting down. She tentatively opens the bathroom stall door. She looks nervously at the man in emergency uniform and nods. Aircraft hurtle towards the dazzling lights of Chicago. Helen looks shocked and stares out of the window of the craft at the city lights. Helen and Yusef hold hands as the engineers brace themselves. Helen opens her eyes. A bright ball of light is moving through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It passes behind the towering Willis Tower. It illuminates the red-brick façade of the Wrigley Building and moves with swirling brilliance towards Millennium Park. Trees cast eerie shadows across the lawn as people gather and stare up in horror. As Helen stares out of the craft window at the object sinking towards the ground, powerful jets of air slow its descent, generating clouds of whirling mist. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its intense light. The draft from the object's descent causes a wave of wind and mist.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She discovers a razor and a shaving brush. He stares at her boldly. She grumbles and, lifting a washing basket, leaps downstairs. Red and blue lights sparkle outside, as she hurries to the front door. A blonde woman in a blue top is sitting among the group of police officers. Helen feels surprised. Motorcycle outriders plan to guide the waiting car. A stern-faced woman with dark hair reclines in the front seat. The blonde woman wraps her arms protectively around the bewildered Jacob. The convoy of two cars and four motorcycles drifts away. Lights flickering, they rush down rain-drenched streets. He gestures to the road ahead. Beyond the outriders, their side of the highway remains vacant. She gazes at the indifferent agent who gazes straight ahead ignoring her. More vehicles accompany the convoy gliding down the deserted nighttime highway. Military vehicles and personnel navigate as gates slide to allow them entry. A Chinook helicopter rests outside a large hangar. The convoy pauses at an aircraft. It's arranged rack down. The agent guides the astonished Helen towards the helicopter. Inside, it's crowded with soldiers and some civilians. Helen spots a space and settles down uneasily. She glances across at a man with a dark, bushy beard. The twin rotor helicopter ascends into the dark night sky. Floodlights brighten a sports field bustling with equipment and personnel. The chopper touches down mid-field. A soldier bears a heavy machine gun on his shoulder. As police cars follow more vehicles through the military crowd, soldiers drag racks of protective clothing along a walkway. A NASA space agency logo embellishes the screen in a large lecture theater. It's heading on a collision path with the Earth. Graphics display impact location Manhattan. Helen feels astonished. The screen displays one hour 18 minutes 43 seconds. The time is ticking down. She cautiously closes the toilet cubicle door. She glances nervously at the woman in military uniform and nods. Choppers soar towards the bright lights of Manhattan. Helen feels stunned and gazes out of the window of the chopper at the city lights. Helen and Yusef clasp hands as the scientists steady themselves. Helen shuts her eyes. A bright orb of light is drifting through the dark sky above the illuminated city. It glides past the towering Empire State Building. It brightens the bell gothic façade of Saint Patrick's Cathedral and travels with swirling brilliance towards Central Park. Trees project eerie shadows across the grass as people gather and gaze up in fear. As Helen glances out of the chopper window at the object lifting towards the sky, powerful blasts of energy slow its ascent, generating clouds of swirling vapor. The watching crowds are silhouetted in its piercing light. The draft from the object's ascent triggers a surge of wind and vapor.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The pigeon spots a trumpet and a paintbrush. A cactus looks at the pigeon defiantly. The pigeon sighs and, carrying a backpack, runs downstairs. Yellow and green lights flash outside, as the pigeon crosses to the back door. A tall man in a red hat is standing among the group of firefighters. Oscar looks shocked. Bicycle riders prepare to escort the waiting train. A cheerful man with blond hair sits in the rear seat. The tall man puts his arms protectively around the bemused Melody. The convoy of five trucks and two bicycles pulls away. Horns blaring, they speed down fog-filled avenues. A goat points to the sky above. Beyond the bicycles, their side of the river is empty. A rabbit stares at the wandering giraffe who stares straight ahead ignoring the rabbit. More bicycles join the convoy zigzagging down the crowded daytime river. Civilian cars and performers maneuver as doorways open to admit them. A stealth bomber stands outside a small shed. The convoy pulls up at a barn. It's loaded container down. The giraffe ushers the puzzled Oscar towards the bomber. Inside, it's packed with artists and some farmers. Oscar finds a corner and sits down anxiously. Oscar looks across at a woman with a curly, red wig. The triple rotor bomber lifts off into the light morning sunrise. Lanterns illuminate a parade ground bustling with furniture and performers. The bomber lands mid-ground. A dancer carries a giant microphone on her head. As fire trucks escort more bicycles through the civilian throng, performers push carts of musical instruments along a path. A World Bank logo adorns the curtain in a small concert hall. It's on a path intersecting with Mars. Animations show impact location Sydney. Oscar stares. The curtain shows thirty minutes 12 seconds. The time is ticking down. Oscar tentatively opens the closet cubicle door. Oscar looks anxiously at the robot in clerical attire and nods. Cars race towards the shimmering lights of Sydney. Oscar looks stunned and stares out of the window of the bomber at the city skyline. Oscar and Maria hold paintbrushes as the inventors brace themselves. Oscar opens his eyes. A glowing orb of fire is drifting through the light sky above the sparkling city. It passes by the towering Sydney Opera House. It enhances the stone baroque façade of St. Mary's Cathedral and dances with swirling radiance towards Hyde Park. Statues cast dim shadows across the pavement as vehicles gather and gaze up in awe. As Oscar stares out of the bomber window at the entity climbing towards the horizon, gentle waves of force slow its rise, forming clouds of swirling mist. The onlooking arrival is silhouetted in its gentle glow. The draft from the entity's rise causes a flurry of breeze and mist.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: A dog discovers a banana and a toothbrush. A cat gazes at the dog thoughtfully. The dog growls and, dragging a laundry basket, trots upstairs. Green and yellow balloons float inside, as the dog leaps to the back window. A red-haired boy in a green vest is hopping among the group of firefighters. George looks confused. Bicycle couriers get ready to follow the parked truck. A cheerful-faced man with blond hair lounges in the backseat. The red-haired boy places his hands proudly around the perplexed Quentin. The parade of three trucks and six bicycles pushes forward. Balloons floating, they glide down sun-drenched boulevards. She gestures to the sky above. Beyond the cyclists, their side of the boulevard is bustling. The cat glares at the cheerful clown who grins broadly, ignoring it. More animals gather with the parade, rolling down the crowded daytime boulevard. Civilian drones and staff glide as gates swing to admit them. A biplane rests outside an enormous dome. The parade halts at a dirigible. It’s tipped wing up. The clown beckons the bewildered George towards the biplane. Inside, it’s brimming with engineers and a few travelers. George claims a spot and perches anxiously. She surveys a girl with a short, sleek ponytail. The single-propeller plane hovers into the bright morning sky. Spotlights illuminate a concert arena bustling with spectators and performers. The plane touches down center-stage. An artist heaves a bass guitar over his shoulder. As ambulance vans guide more drones through the civilian mass, engineers drag crates of musical instruments along a corridor. An international broadcasting logo flashes on the monitor in a small studio. It’s charting a voyage to the Moon. Animations display landing zone Cairo. George gapes. The display shows eight hours 42 minutes 17 seconds. The clock is ticking up. He cautiously shuts the wardrobe cabinet door. The mouse glances nervously at the girl in lab coat and winks. Planes race towards the bright stars of Cairo. George looks amazed and peers out of the portal of the plane at the city skyline. George and Fiona high-five as the artists prepare themselves. George shuts his eyes. A shining circle of stars is twinkling through the clear sky above the glistening ocean. It slips behind the towering Burj Khalifa. It catches the ornate façade of Notre Dame and glides with steady brightness towards Hyde Park. Birds cast sharp silhouettes across the water as tourists gather and point up in excitement. As George peers out of the plane portal at the formation climbing towards the sky, gentle waves of wind hasten its ascent, dispersing streams of shimmering mist. The gathering tourists are outlined in its soft glow. The gust from the formation’s rise causes a cascade of breeze and mist.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She spots a stapler and a dustpan. He glances at her challengingly. She huffs and, carrying a suitcase, dashes upstairs. Yellow and green balloons float outside, as she moves to the back door. A red-haired man in a green sweater is standing among the group of firefighters. Helen looks astonished. Bicycles prepare to chase the parked scooter. A cheerful woman with curly hair sits in the sidecar. The red-haired man places his hands carefully on the bemused Jacob. The line of two scooters and four bicycles rolls away. Horns blaring, they cruise down sunlit streets. He gestures to the sidewalk ahead. Beyond the cyclists, their side of the park is deserted. She glares at the laughing comedian who peers straight ahead, disregarding her. More animals join the parade bounding down the bustling daytime parkway. Construction machines and engineers maneuver as barriers open to allow them. A blimp floats outside a small dock. The parade pulls up at a stage. It's stacked crate up. The comedian directs the startled Helen towards the blimp. Inside, it's crammed with artists and a few tourists. Helen finds a spot and crouches down anxiously. She gazes across at a woman with a light, wispy scarf. The single-engine blimp glides off into the bright morning sky. Spotlights reveal a concert hall packed with instruments and musicians. The blimp lands center-stage. An artist balances a large canvas under his arm. As food trucks follow more bicycles through the musical crowd, musicians pull carts of sound equipment along a corridor. An art gallery logo decorates the screen in a small performance hall. It's on a collision path with Mars. Graphics show landing site Venice. Helen blinks. The screen displays two hours 46 minutes 17 seconds. The timer is ticking up. She cautiously shuts the closet cubicle door. She glances nervously at the man in a chef's outfit and nods. Blimps zoom towards the dim lights of Venice. Helen looks amazed and peers out of the window of the blimp at the city streets. Helen and Yusef link arms as the performers compose themselves. Helen opens her eyes. A glowing sphere of color is floating through the dim sky above the decorated city. It glides behind the majestic Leaning Tower of Pisa. It highlights the ornate Renaissance façade of St. Mark's Basilica and drifts with shimmering radiance towards a public square. Statues cast strange silhouettes across the pavement as people congregate and gaze up in awe. As Helen peers out of the blimp window at the object rising towards the sky, gentle pulses of sound ease its ascent, creating trails of swirling mist. The observing crowds are outlined in its radiant glow. The breeze from the object's ascent creates a wave of air and mist.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She notices a spatula and a gardening trowel. He glares at her triumphantly. She grumbles and, dragging a filing cabinet, tiptoes upstairs. Yellow and green lasers flicker inside, as she hops to the back window. A red-haired man in a green jacket is lounging among the band of firefighters. Pamela feels amused. Dancing robots begin to juggle the gilded bicycle. A joyful man with curly hair kneels on the back seat. The red-haired man places his hands nervously around the startled Kevin. The parade of five bicycles and six hoverboards zooms in. Lasers flickering, they fly down dust-covered alleys. He gestures to the sky above. Beyond the drones, their half of the skyway is crowded. She glares at the cheerful magician who gazes sideways ignoring him. More airplanes join the parade gliding up the crowded morning skyway. Alien ships and creatures wiggle as doors open to welcome them. A hot air balloon hovers inside a tiny garage. The parade floats up at a spaceship. It's filled tent up. The magician pushes the entranced Pamela towards the balloon. Inside, it's crammed with pirates and a few acrobats. Pamela discovers a perch and leans down eagerly. She squints across at a woman with a purple, sleek hat. The triple rotor balloon floats down into the bright sunrise waters. Headlights brighten a stadium buzzing with waffles and dancers. The rocket sails mid-court. A pirate drags a lightweight trampoline under his elbow. As fire engines guide more rockets under the civilian army, acrobats pull beams of rubber tires along a jetty. A Disney aquarium illustration covers the stage in a tiny dining hall. It's on a holiday route to the Moon. Cartoons display landing site Sydney. Pamela laughs. The board reveals twelve minutes 28 seconds. The minute is speeding up. She quickly closes the closet hatch. She grins eagerly at the leader in circus attire and winks. Balloons drift away from the dim shadows of Sydney. Pamela gasps and giggles out of the skylight of the balloon at the ocean waves. Pamela and Omar hug feet as the bakers dance slowly. Pamela opens her mouth. A dim streak of shadow floats across the bright sea beneath the darkened forest. It drifts over the hovering Opera House. It dims the iron classical spires of Sydney Tower and floats with silent darkness away from Bondi Beach. Birds cast spooky outlines across the rocks as tourists climb and dance down in laughter. As Pamela frowns out of the rocket ceiling at the pigeon flying away from the stars, gentle breezes of air lift its rise, creating mists of floating snowflakes. The flying groups are exposed in its dim glow. The breeze from the pigeon's flight causes a hurricane of gusts and snowflakes.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Helen notices a razor and shaving brush before rushing downstairs with a basket, encountering police lights and a shocked crowd outside. A convoy, including a stern woman, escorts her through empty highways to a military site. On the way, Helen is ushered onto a Chinook helicopter filled with soldiers and civilians. As they fly, she sees a NASA logo indicating a collision course with Earth, targeting Manhattan, with just over an hour to impact. Nervously, she acknowledges a woman in uniform. Choppers race toward Manhattan as scientists brace for impact. Helen and Yusef hold hands as the object, a bright ball of light, approaches the city, illuminating landmarks like the Empire State Building and Saint Patrick's Cathedral. It slows its descent above Central Park, casting eerie shadows and creating a tsunami of wind and vapor as people watch in horror.
